name: The Room Of The Dead
description:
Plot: Lisa ordred a pizza for Johnny that was eventually forgotten in the fridge. Over time, the pizza began to rot and a contagious virus developed that turned everyone into zombies. Now it's up to both Johnny and Mark to kill as many zombies and survive as long as they can. If Lisa didn't lie about Johnny hitting her, none of this would have happened. She is tearing everyone apart!!!

This game is based on the movie "The Room," a romance movie made by Tommy Wiseau. This was a video game project that was made in class. Eventually time ran out, and we were not able to add everything we wanted in the game.

Made by Iman Javanmardi, Oliver Cline, Braden Walker, and Jorge Vasquez.
